test_cases.test_name: Verify Microservices Deployment on Validated Servers
test_cases.objective: Ensure that all custom microservices are correctly deployed, version-controlled, and operational within the validated server environment.

test_steps.action: Deploy all microservice containers using approved CI/CD pipeline to the validation environment.
test_steps.expected_result: Deployment completes without error and returns success status codes.

test_steps.action: Execute health-check endpoint for each microservice.
test_steps.expected_result: Each health-check returns HTTP 200 with expected JSON payload.

test_steps.action: Verify service mesh registers all microservices with correct metadata.
test_steps.expected_result: Service mesh UI shows all microservices in 'Running' state with correct version tags.

acceptance_criteria: All microservices deployed, healthy, and registered without errors.

test_cases.test_name: Validate Custom Data Lake Installation and Configuration
test_cases.objective: Confirm that the custom data lake platform is installed, configured with correct security policies, and ready to store GMP data.

test_steps.action: Install data lake services using vendor-approved scripts.
test_steps.expected_result: Installer finishes with zero errors and generates completion report.

test_steps.action: Configure storage buckets with GMP retention policies.
test_steps.expected_result: Buckets created with immutable retention period per SOP.

test_steps.action: Execute validation query to confirm write/read operations.
test_steps.expected_result: Test file written and read back with byte-for-byte accuracy.

acceptance_criteria: Installation completes successfully and data lake passes functional write/read test.

test_cases.test_name: Verify Custom Encryption Service Installation and Key Rotation
test_cases.objective: Validate that proprietary encryption modules are installed and that automated key rotation functions per design specifications.

test_steps.action: Install encryption service and enable FIPS-level cryptographic modules.
test_steps.expected_result: Service installs without critical errors and registers in OS services list.

test_steps.action: Generate initial encryption keys and store in HSM.
test_steps.expected_result: Key generation succeeds and keys are stored securely with correct metadata.

test_steps.action: Trigger scheduled key rotation job manually.
test_steps.expected_result: Old keys archived, new keys active, and system continues to encrypt/decrypt data transparently.

acceptance_criteria: Encryption service operational and key rotation executes without data loss.

test_cases.test_name: Validate Custom Disaster Recovery Replication and Failover
test_cases.objective: Demonstrate that the disaster recovery subsystem replicates data with zero loss and supports seamless failover between primary and secondary sites.
prerequisites: Primary and secondary data centers operational

test_steps.action: Initiate baseline full replication from primary to secondary.
test_steps.expected_result: Replication completes and checksums match between sites.

test_steps.action: Simulate primary site failure by shutting down core services.
test_steps.expected_result: Secondary site becomes primary within RTO and services remain available.

test_steps.action: Restore original primary site and perform failback.
test_steps.expected_result: Data re-synchronizes with zero loss and system returns to normal operation.

acceptance_criteria: Replication integrity maintained and failover/failback executed within SLA.

test_cases.test_name: Functional Test of Proprietary Batch Scheduling Algorithm Accuracy
test_cases.objective: Verify that the custom batch scheduling engine produces optimized schedules matching expected results for multi-product scenarios.

test_steps.action: Load test dataset of 20 concurrent product orders into the scheduling engine.
test_steps.expected_result: Engine accepts dataset without errors.

test_steps.action: Execute scheduling run and export generated schedule.
test_steps.expected_result: Schedule generated within 60 seconds.

test_steps.action: Compare generated schedule to reference optimized schedule.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation ≤1% on total production time and resource utilization.

acceptance_criteria: Scheduling deviation ≤1% from reference for all KPIs.

test_cases.test_name: Real-Time Process Monitoring Data Acquisition Functional Test
test_cases.objective: Confirm that the system captures sub-second process data reliably and displays accurate real-time trends.

test_steps.action: Inject simulated high-frequency sensor data at 1000 Hz.
test_steps.expected_result: System ingests data without loss or backlog.

test_steps.action: Display real-time trend on operator dashboard.
test_steps.expected_result: Graph updates within 200 ms latency.

test_steps.action: Export captured dataset after 10 minutes.
test_steps.expected_result: Exported file size and checksum match calculated expectation.

acceptance_criteria: No data loss, latency ≤200 ms, checksum integrity confirmed.

test_cases.test_name: Machine Learning Deviation Detection Correctness and Robustness Test
test_cases.objective: Evaluate that the ML model accurately detects process deviations with predefined sensitivity and specificity thresholds.
prerequisites: Labeled test dataset with known deviations

test_steps.action: Run ML model on 10,000 historical data points containing 150 known deviations.
test_steps.expected_result: Model processes dataset without error.

test_steps.action: Calculate sensitivity and specificity metrics.
test_steps.expected_result: Sensitivity ≥95% and specificity ≥93%.

test_steps.action: Inject 50 novel edge-case deviations and re-run analysis.
test_steps.expected_result: Model flags ≥48 of 50 edge cases.

acceptance_criteria: Sensitivity and specificity thresholds met for both historical and edge-case datasets.

test_cases.test_name: Workflow Engine Material Genealogy Tracking Functional Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify that the custom workflow engine tracks material genealogy across complex parent-child relationships without loss of traceability.
prerequisites: Genealogy test batch master data created

test_steps.action: Create parent batch and five child batches through workflow engine.
test_steps.expected_result: All batches created with unique, sequential genealogy IDs.

test_steps.action: Perform split and merge operations per SOP.
test_steps.expected_result: System updates genealogy tree correctly in real time.

test_steps.action: Generate genealogy report and verify lineage accuracy.
test_steps.expected_result: Report shows complete lineage without gaps.

acceptance_criteria: Genealogy accuracy 100% for all operations.

test_cases.test_name: Dynamic Electronic Batch Record Form Generation Functional Test
test_cases.objective: Confirm that the eBR module dynamically generates forms based on product recipe and regulatory rules.

test_steps.action: Select product recipe A and initiate batch record creation.
test_steps.expected_result: System prompts correct dynamic form fields.

test_steps.action: Validate that mandatory regulatory fields are locked for editing.
test_steps.expected_result: Locked fields are non-editable and pre-populated.

test_steps.action: Submit form and check audit trail entry.
test_steps.expected_result: Audit trail captures user, timestamp, and hash of form.

acceptance_criteria: Forms generated correctly, mandatory fields enforced, audit trail created.

test_cases.test_name: Audit Trail Event Logging and Retrieval Functional Verification
test_cases.objective: Validate the proprietary audit trail implementation captures all required elements and supports reliable retrieval and review.

test_steps.action: Perform create, modify, and delete actions on a test record.
test_steps.expected_result: Audit trail captures user ID, timestamp, action, and before/after values.

test_steps.action: Export audit trail for selected period.
test_steps.expected_result: Export completes and hash matches system stored hash.

test_steps.action: Attempt to tamper with exported audit file and re-import.
test_steps.expected_result: System rejects tampered file and logs security event.

acceptance_criteria: All actions recorded, export integrity verified, tampering detected.

test_cases.test_name: Electronic Signature with Biometric Authentication Functional Test
test_cases.objective: Verify that electronic signatures require biometric authentication and meet FDA requirements for signing critical GMP records.

test_steps.action: Initiate signature request on critical batch step.
test_steps.expected_result: System prompts biometric scan for the logged-in user.

test_steps.action: Provide mismatched biometric data.
test_steps.expected_result: System denies signature and logs failed attempt.

test_steps.action: Provide correct biometric data and complete signature.
test_steps.expected_result: Signature applied, audit trail records biometric hash and user details.

acceptance_criteria: Incorrect biometrics rejected; correct biometrics accepted with full audit trail.

test_cases.test_name: Real-Time Data Integrity Monitoring with Blockchain Functional Test
test_cases.objective: Ensure blockchain integration records immutable hashes of GMP data streams in real time and triggers alerts for integrity breaches.

test_steps.action: Generate GMP data and observe blockchain transaction creation.
test_steps.expected_result: Hash transactions appear within 5 seconds of data creation.

test_steps.action: Attempt unauthorized alteration of stored data.
test_steps.expected_result: Alteration detected and integrity alert generated within 30 seconds.

test_steps.action: Verify blockchain ledger remains untampered.
test_steps.expected_result: Ledger integrity check passes with zero discrepancies.

acceptance_criteria: Blockchain entries created timely, breach alert triggered, ledger remains immutable.

test_cases.test_name: Quality Event Management Automated CAPA Generation Functional Test
test_cases.objective: Validate that the quality event module automatically generates CAPA records when predefined thresholds are exceeded.

test_steps.action: Create a simulated deviation that exceeds critical limit.
test_steps.expected_result: System generates quality event record automatically.

test_steps.action: Verify CAPA record linked to the event.
test_steps.expected_result: CAPA created with correct root cause category pre-selected.

test_steps.action: Check notification email delivery to QA lead.
test_steps.expected_result: Email received with event and CAPA details.

acceptance_criteria: Event, CAPA, and notification generated as per configuration.

test_cases.test_name: Statistical Process Control Trend Analysis Algorithm Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify that the SPC module calculates control limits and trends accurately for process parameters.

test_steps.action: Run SPC analysis on 1000 data points for parameter X.
test_steps.expected_result: System calculates X-bar and R control limits without error.

test_steps.action: Manually calculate limits using validated spreadsheet.
test_steps.expected_result: Difference between system and manual calculation ≤0.5%.

test_steps.action: Trigger rule violations to ensure alerts fire.
test_steps.expected_result: Alerts generated for Western Electric rule breaches.

acceptance_criteria: Calculated limits match manual reference within tolerance and alerts fire appropriately.

test_cases.test_name: Predictive Quality Analytics Machine Learning Model Validation
test_cases.objective: Demonstrate that predictive analytics accurately forecasts out-of-spec trends at least 2 hours before occurrence.

test_steps.action: Feed live process data with artificially injected drift.
test_steps.expected_result: Model flags impending OOS within 10 minutes of drift start.

test_steps.action: Confirm alert appears on dashboard and email.
test_steps.expected_result: Both channels receive alert with same identifier.

test_steps.action: Verify accuracy of prediction against actual OOS occurrence time.
test_steps.expected_result: Prediction within ±15 minutes of actual.

acceptance_criteria: Prediction accuracy within limits and alerts issued through all channels.

test_cases.test_name: Performance Test for Sub-Second Data Acquisition Under Load
test_cases.objective: Assess the system's capacity to handle 10,000 sensor inputs at 1000 Hz while maintaining sub-second latency.

test_steps.action: Generate concurrent sensor data streams totaling 10,000 signals.
test_steps.expected_result: System CPU and memory utilization remain below 80%.

test_steps.action: Measure ingestion latency for randomly sampled signals.
test_steps.expected_result: Latency ≤800 ms for 99th percentile.

test_steps.action: Record any data loss or backlog events.
test_steps.expected_result: No data loss or backlog recorded.

acceptance_criteria: All KPIs within specified thresholds.

test_cases.test_name: Performance Test of Batch Scheduling Engine at Peak Demand
test_cases.objective: Ensure scheduling engine meets performance SLA of 60 seconds under peak demand of 100 simultaneous product orders.

test_steps.action: Inject 100 concurrent product orders via API.
test_steps.expected_result: Orders accepted without queue overflow.

test_steps.action: Record total time to generate complete schedule.
test_steps.expected_result: Total time ≤60 seconds.

test_steps.action: Verify CPU and memory within 85% of capacity.
test_steps.expected_result: Resource utilization within limits.

acceptance_criteria: Schedule completed within SLA with resources within limits.

test_cases.test_name: Performance Test of LIMS API Throughput and Stability
test_cases.objective: Validate that the custom API to multiple LIMS systems sustains 500 requests per second without errors.

test_steps.action: Execute load test at 500 requests/second for 30 minutes.
test_steps.expected_result: Error rate <0.1%.

test_steps.action: Monitor response time distribution.
test_steps.expected_result: 95th percentile response time ≤300 ms.

test_steps.action: Validate data integrity of 100 sampled responses.
test_steps.expected_result: Sampled responses match source LIMS data exactly.

acceptance_criteria: Throughput, error rate, and response time within limits; data integrity preserved.

test_cases.test_name: Mobile Application Latency and Offline Functionality Performance Test
test_cases.objective: Verify mobile applications maintain ≤2-second latency and proper offline data caching on the shop floor.

test_steps.action: Measure average latency for 100 data capture actions online.
test_steps.expected_result: Average latency ≤2 seconds.

test_steps.action: Disable network and perform 50 actions offline.
test_steps.expected_result: Offline actions cached without error.

test_steps.action: Reconnect network and synchronize cached actions.
test_steps.expected_result: All cached data synchronized and timestamps preserved.

acceptance_criteria: Latency, caching, and sync requirements met.

test_cases.test_name: Security Penetration Test of Proprietary Encryption Algorithms
test_cases.objective: Assess the resilience of the custom encryption implementation against common cryptographic attacks.

test_steps.action: Perform brute-force attack on encrypted dataset.
test_steps.expected_result: System detects attack and locks access after threshold.

test_steps.action: Attempt known-plaintext attack using captured traffic.
test_steps.expected_result: Decryption unsuccessful; no plaintext revealed.

test_steps.action: Scan for weak cipher suites.
test_steps.expected_result: No weak ciphers enabled.

acceptance_criteria: All attacks unsuccessful and detected where applicable.

test_cases.test_name: Biometric Authentication Spoof Resistance Security Test
test_cases.objective: Ensure biometric authentication framework resists spoofing attempts using synthetic fingerprints and photographs.

test_steps.action: Present synthetic fingerprint to scanner.
test_steps.expected_result: System rejects authentication and logs attempt.

test_steps.action: Present high-resolution photograph for facial recognition.
test_steps.expected_result: System rejects and records security event.

test_steps.action: Attempt genuine biometric authentication.
test_steps.expected_result: System grants access within 3 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: All spoof attempts rejected; genuine authentication succeeds.

test_cases.test_name: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement Security Test
test_cases.objective: Verify that RBAC prevents unauthorized access to restricted MES functions and data.

test_steps.action: Login as Operator and attempt to access admin console.
test_steps.expected_result: Access denied and event logged.

test_steps.action: Login as QA and attempt to modify system configuration.
test_steps.expected_result: Modification blocked and logged.

test_steps.action: Login as Admin and perform configuration change.
test_steps.expected_result: Change allowed and audited.

acceptance_criteria: Only authorized roles can perform restricted actions; all attempts logged.

test_cases.test_name: Blockchain Tamper Resistance Security Validation
test_cases.objective: Evaluate blockchain ledger resistance to tampering by attempting unauthorized block modifications.

test_steps.action: Attempt to alter historical block data directly in the database.
test_steps.expected_result: Integrity check fails and node quarantines altered block.

test_steps.action: Inject forged transaction into pending block.
test_steps.expected_result: Consensus mechanism rejects forged transaction.

test_steps.action: Verify overall ledger integrity post-attack.
test_steps.expected_result: No unauthorized changes present.

acceptance_criteria: All tamper attempts detected and prevented; ledger remains intact.

test_cases.test_name: ALCOA+ Audit Trail Integrity and Review Data Integrity Test
test_cases.objective: Verify that audit trails satisfy all ALCOA+ principles and can be reviewed, filtered, and reported accurately.
prerequisites: Audit trail populated with at least 5000 events

test_steps.action: Run automated ALCOA+ compliance checker on audit trail.
test_steps.expected_result: No violations detected.

test_steps.action: Filter audit trail by user and date range.
test_steps.expected_result: Filter returns correct subset of records.

test_steps.action: Generate PDF audit report and verify digital signature.
test_steps.expected_result: Report signature valid; contents match database records.

acceptance_criteria: All ALCOA+ checks pass; filtered data accurate; report integrity verified.

test_cases.test_name: Real-Time Data Integrity Alert Efficacy Validation
test_cases.objective: Ensure that automated compliance monitoring generates timely alerts when data integrity rules are breached.

test_steps.action: Simulate timestamp manipulation in process data.
test_steps.expected_result: Integrity rule triggers alert within 1 minute.

test_steps.action: Acknowledge alert and document corrective action.
test_steps.expected_result: Alert status updates to acknowledged with user attribution.

test_steps.action: Review audit trail for alert lifecycle.
test_steps.expected_result: Lifecycle events complete and unaltered.

acceptance_criteria: Alert generated within SLA, acknowledged properly, lifecycle intact.

test_cases.test_name: Data Lake Write and Read Fidelity Data Integrity Test
test_cases.objective: Validate that data written to the data lake is retrieved without alteration across storage tiers.

test_steps.action: Write 10 GB test file to data lake hot tier.
test_steps.expected_result: Write completes and checksum recorded.

test_steps.action: Migrate file to cold tier using lifecycle policy.
test_steps.expected_result: Migration completes without error.

test_steps.action: Read file from cold tier and recalculate checksum.
test_steps.expected_result: Checksum matches original.

acceptance_criteria: Checksums match; no data alteration detected.

test_cases.test_name: Zero Data Loss Verification in Disaster Recovery Scenario
test_cases.objective: Confirm disaster recovery system achieves zero data loss objective during unplanned outage.

test_steps.action: Insert unique record set immediately before simulated outage.
test_steps.expected_result: Records replicated to secondary site.

test_steps.action: Trigger unplanned outage by disconnecting primary storage.
test_steps.expected_result: Failover occurs automatically.

test_steps.action: Verify existence and integrity of record set on secondary site.
test_steps.expected_result: All records present with identical checksums.

acceptance_criteria: No data loss; records identical post-failover.

test_cases.test_name: End-to-End LIMS Integration Data Flow Test
test_cases.objective: Ensure that test results created in LIMS flow through API into MES without modification and trigger appropriate workflow steps.

test_steps.action: Create test result in LIMS with unique identifier.
test_steps.expected_result: Result accepted by LIMS.

test_steps.action: Monitor MES for inbound API transaction.
test_steps.expected_result: Result appears in MES within 60 seconds.

test_steps.action: Compare data fields between LIMS and MES records.
test_steps.expected_result: All fields match exactly.

acceptance_criteria: Data flows within SLA and remains unaltered.

test_cases.test_name: IoT Equipment Connectivity Integration Test
test_cases.objective: Validate that IoT framework connects to equipment PLCs and transmits data securely into MES.

test_steps.action: Connect IoT gateway to PLC simulator and publish tag data.
test_steps.expected_result: Gateway establishes secure MQTT connection.

test_steps.action: Verify data received in MES real-time dashboard.
test_steps.expected_result: Dashboard updates with correct tag values.

test_steps.action: Disconnect network and observe reconnection behavior.
test_steps.expected_result: Gateway buffers data and resends upon reconnection without loss.

acceptance_criteria: Secure connectivity established, data received accurately, and reconnection manages buffered data.

test_cases.test_name: Real-Time Supply Chain Predictive Analytics Integration Test
test_cases.objective: Validate integration of supply chain data feeds and predictive analytics dashboard for material availability forecasting.

test_steps.action: Ingest live supply chain feed containing 500 material SKUs.
test_steps.expected_result: System processes feed without error.

test_steps.action: Generate forecast report for next 30 days.
test_steps.expected_result: Report generated within 2 minutes with no missing SKUs.

test_steps.action: Cross-verify forecast accuracy against benchmark dataset.
test_steps.expected_result: Forecast accuracy ≥90%.

acceptance_criteria: Feed processed, report generated timely, accuracy threshold met.
